section.title: lead times analysis of Lead Time Analysis
section.para: The "Lead Time Analysis" screen helps you get a better picture of the Lead Times—both cumulative and individual—for complex bills of materials. To analyze your Lead Times, select the "Lead Time Analysis" option. The following screen will appear:
When analyzing Lead Times, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the item number of the item whose Lead Times you want to analyze.

Display lists Lead Times for the specified item and its underlying components. This display is a nested list, with a plus ("+") sign located to the far left of the display next to each manufactured item. By clicking your mouse on a plus sign, you reveal lower levels of information related to the item. Rows of information are color-coded for ease of use. Subassemblies are green, purchased items are blue, and items having the maximum Lead Time are red.
